select
c.nombre, c.documento, c.telefono, c.direccion, c.email, c.vetado,
ir.id as IR_id, ir.fechainiciorenta as IR_fechainiciorenta, ir.fechafinrenta as IR_fechafinrenta,
i.id as IR_I_id, i.nombre as IR_I_nombre, i.descripcion as IR_I_descripcion, i.fechaLanzamiento as IR_I_fechaLanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia as IR_I_tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta as IR_I_formatorenta, i.genero as IR_I_genero,
ti.id as IR_I_TI_id, ti.descripcion as IR_I_TI_descripcion
FROM VI_CLIENTES as c left join VI_ITEMRENTADO as ir on c.documento=ir.CLIENTES_documento left join VI_ITEMS as i on ir.ITEMS_id=i.id left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id
